detail_desc: Metal earrings decorated with a large sparkly stone butterfly. Length 6.5 cm.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the waist, side pockets and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Straight-cut shirt in airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.

Padded ski mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, and elastication and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Sleeveless, double-breasted, knee-length dress in soft twill made from a viscose blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Fake welt pockets with a flap at the front, and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the lining is partly recycled.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in fine-knit cotton. Jumper with a round, ribbed neckline, buttons at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print on the front, gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt in tulle.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a frill trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep, flounce-trimmed, elasticated V-neck front and back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support and decorative crossover lacing at the front.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Imitation suede slippers with soft pile linings and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and ties at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a tie belt and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Wide dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket with a flap and button. Legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Chinos in premium cotton twill with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hairband in braided imitation suede with leaf and flower appliqués. Elastic at the back of the neck.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Mittens with pompoms and a motif with a front flap that can be fastened back to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves. Ribbed, foldover cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with glass rhinestones. Diameter 3.5 cm, 4.5 cm and 5 cm.
Sandals in soft suede with narrow elastication at the back of the heel. Covered block heels 7 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit with narrow hems.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in patterned jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication, a seam centre front and slit at the hem.
Thong briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey. Low waist with a wide, elastic waistband and a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a shaft that finishes at the knee.
Wide, double-breasted coat in soft wool with wide notch lapels, dropped shoulders, flap front pockets and adjustable tabs with a button at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumpsuit woven in a viscose blend with a flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back. Seam with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, toe caps and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem with a wide lace trim. Slightly longer at the back.

Fully lined textured swimsuit with cut-out sections and padded cups with removable inserts. Decorative ties at the bust and, ties at the back and back of the neck. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled fabric.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a square neckline that is elasticated at the back and short butterfly sleeves that are elasticated over the shoulders. Gathered yoke at the front, a seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Lined in a cotton weave.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top and short flounced sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and narrow shoulder straps.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a lace yoke, short raglan sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Open-toed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with open sides and slim, covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Captain’s cap in cotton twill with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight stretch cotton twill with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and shaping seams at the knees.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back with a raw-edge lace trim.
Faux fur coat with wide notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and long, flared sleeves. Lined.

Trousers in a viscose weave with wide covered elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the top and a sewn-in tie belt with wide belt loops at the front. Diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a button. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short waistcoat woven in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and cut-off sleeves with visible shoulder padding and raw edges. Chest pocket, an inner pocket, a high slit at the back and long ties at the hem. Lined.
Long, fitted dress in heavily draping, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Narrow-cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Sleeveless blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with a textured pattern. Collar, buttons down the front, hemstitched insets and sewn-in pin-tucks at the front and a small frill trim around the armholes.
Wide trousers in soft velvet made from a silk blend with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, fine-knit dress in a soft viscose blend with a slight sheen. The dress is in a straight style with short, flounced sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Chelsea boots in matt imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 4 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
